name: Line Operations
description: Perform various operations on lines of text.

name: Text Info
description: Provides statistics on user-supplied text input.

name: Find & Replace
description: Find and replace text using strings or regex with advanced options.

name: Hashing Tool
description: Hash, encode, and decode text using various algorithms and formats.

name: Coding Tutorials
description: Tutorials for various programming languages, sorted by language and topic.

name: Sequence Generator
description: Creates sequences of numbers with or without additional text.

name: Random Number Generator
description: Generate random numbers with options for range, quantity, decimals, uniqueness, and sorting.
